alert.note: Alert for Grant; Iowa; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 20 at 4:41AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Kickapoo River at Gays Mills affecting Crawford County. Trempealeau River at Dodge affecting Buffalo and Trempealeau Counties. Wisconsin River at Muscoda affecting Grant, Richland and Iowa zones. Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. .Recent rainfall combined with melting snow will cause river rises. The rivers may reach flood stage this weekend. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Muscoda. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Flooding may impact some homes in Boscobel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon.
